name: Ban and delete in community - linked device @android @medium-risk @3-devices
description:
Verifies that a community admin can ban a user and delete their messages.
    Then, restore the banned account on a second device. 
    The banned user cannot send messages anymore on either of their linked devices.

Then, restore the banned account on a second device.
The banned user cannot send messages anymore on either of their linked devices.
